RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the patrol car: marked United States/Mexican Border Patrol vehicles
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the large white Ford pickup truck: the large white Ford pickup truck

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the large white Ford pickup truck: Vehicle in which Michael Brett Jacquinot was a passenger during the United States/Mexican Border Patrol stop, bearing a Kansas license plate and appearing suspicious due to its presence in Big Bend National Park on a Sunday morning. It was stopped 70 or 80 miles from the United States/Mexican Border after being followed for approximately fifteen minutes. Contained 286.44 pounds of marijuana in a toolbox and two unloaded handguns in the cab.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.marked United States/Mexican Border Patr: Vehicles used by United States/Mexican Border Patrol agents for patrol and surveillance
